DOC.brief_summary: This active surveillance will include all NSCLC patients treated with nintedanib per the inclusion/exclusion criteria at approximately 20 selected centers until it is confirmed that 100 patients treated with nintedanib are included and that baseline characteristics of 100 additional patients (or as many patients as in the nintedanib group if <100) planned to be treated with single agent docetaxel are collected from the same centres during the same time frame, or until a maximum of two years, whichever occurs first
DOC.brief_title: Post Marketing Surveillance of Nintedanib in Indian Patients With Non-small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) After First-line Therapy
